org.jsimpledb.maven

Class GenerateSchemaMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.jsimpledb.maven.AbstractSchemaMojo
        • org.jsimpledb.maven.AbstractMainSchemaMojo
          • org.jsimpledb.maven.GenerateSchemaMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo

    @Mojo(name="generate",
      requiresDependencyResolution=COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME,
      threadSafe=true)
public class GenerateSchemaMojo
extends AbstractMainSchemaMojo
    Generates a schema XML file from a set of JSimpleDB model classes.

    Such a file can be used to detect schema changes that require a new schema version number as Java model classes are modified over time.
